alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Douglas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 5:00PM MDT until August 11 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Douglas County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 500 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Castle Pines, or 15 miles south of Denver, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... The Pinery around 510 PM MDT. Southwestern Aurora and Parker around 515 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Arapahoe Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
